title: 257.026 NOTIFICATION OF RESIDENCE WITH CERTAIN CONVICTED PERSONS.
text: A person who is granted or exercises custody of a child or parenting time with a child under this chapter or chapter 518 must notify the child's other parent, if any, the county social services agency, and the court that granted the custody or parenting time, if the person knowingly marries or lives in the same residence with a person who has been convicted of a crime listed in section 518.179, subdivision 2.
